scripts.test: echo "Error: run tests from root" && exit 1
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run clean && tsc && echo 'Build Complete.'
scripts.publish:patch: git diff --exit-code && npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: git diff --exit-code && npm run build && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.publish:major: git diff --exit-code && npm run build && npm version major && npm publish
scripts.publish:rc: git diff --exit-code && npm run build && npm version prerelease --preid=rc && npm publish
